## Variables

<table><thead><tr><th>

Variable


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[CRITICAL\_COLLATERAL\_RATIO](./stablecoin-lib-base.critical_collateral_ratio.md)


</td><td>

Total collateral ratio below which recovery mode is triggered.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[LIQUIDATION\_RESERVE](./stablecoin-lib-base.liquidation_reserve.md)


</td><td>

Amount of DebtToken that's reserved for compensating the liquidator of a Trove.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[MAXIMUM\_BORROWING\_RATE](./stablecoin-lib-base.maximum_borrowing_rate.md)


</td><td>

Value that the [borrowing rate](./stablecoin-lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md) will never exceed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[MINIMUM\_BORROWING\_RATE](./stablecoin-lib-base.minimum_borrowing_rate.md)


</td><td>

Value that the [borrowing rate](./stablecoin-lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md) will never decay below.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[MINIMUM\_COLLATERAL\_RATIO](./stablecoin-lib-base.minimum_collateral_ratio.md)


</td><td>

Collateral ratio below which a Trove can be liquidated in normal mode.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[MINIMUM\_DEBT](./stablecoin-lib-base.minimum_debt.md)


</td><td>

A Trove must always have at least this much debt.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[MINIMUM\_NET\_DEBT](./stablecoin-lib-base.minimum_net_debt.md)


</td><td>

A Trove must always have at least this much debt on top of the [liquidation reserve](./stablecoin-lib-base.liquidation_reserve.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[MINIMUM\_REDEMPTION\_RATE](./stablecoin-lib-base.minimum_redemption_rate.md)


</td><td>

Value that the [redemption rate](./stablecoin-lib-base.fees.redemptionrate.md) will never decay below.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
